# ![](images/openscapes_hex.png){.inline} Openscapes JupyterHub Access ![](images/2i2c-logo.png){.inline}

:::

[Openscapes](https://openscapes.org) supports organizations that are starting to explore cloud computing by partnering with [2i2c](https://2i2c.org), who design and administer a global network of community hubs. Openscapes Hubs provide a place for people to teach workshops and experiment with cloud-based workflows.

Access the login page for your organization below:
